description: Aaron Parker is the manservant who knows exactly how to take Senator Race Jensen's mind off the swill of the Big Easy.  Amid the brocaded upholstery and roccoco flair of a southern plantation house, Aaron sucks and serves his muscled and demanding monsieur...opening up to the Senator for a solid pounding that leaves both men spent but sated.
title: Deep South: The Big And The Easy, Part 1
